name: Viral Vectors
description:
The pandemic of 2020's Covid-19 Coronavirus stimulated new research into fighting viral infections with nanites. But to penetrate the cell the nanites need take the right shape to safely cross the cell's natural defense barriers! Traverse this dangerous landscape and destroy the virus before it multiplies and kills the cell!

There is no game. You have been fooled. Let's be friends.

It could have been amazing, but I needed another week. This is why artists can't have nice games.

GDD uploaded so I feel more special.
